song_lyrics: ange ūjḷā thayā chhe kesh... ghaḍ 1
Nahotu joītu te shīd āviyu re,
kaheshe khuṇe ḍhāḷo eṇā khāṭ... ghaḍ 2
Roj ne roj joī rābḍī re,
evī baḷī re ghaḍpaṇnī ṭev... ghaḍ 3
Khādhu to anna pache nahi re,
vaḷī beṭhā to nav rahevāy... ghaḍ 4
Gharnā kahe chhe marto nathī re,
tane besī rahetā shu thāy... ghaḍ 5
have ghaḍpaṇnā shyā re hāl... ghaḍ 6
Bairā chhokrā faṭ faṭ kare re,
nāṇā moṭā maḷi de chhe gāḷ... ghaḍ 7
je kāī kīdhu hashe jamṇe hāth... ghaḍ 9
Evu nafaṭ chhe ā vrūddhpaṇu re,
Mahetā Narsinh ūtaryā bhav pār... ghaḍ 10
title: Ghaḍpaṇ koṇe mokalyu jāṇyu joban rahe sahukāl

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-556: Narsinha Mehta

Category: Updeshna Pad
